snippet: A suicide bomber killed at least three people Saturday in an attack on a market in northeast Nigeria, police and civilian vigilante sources said.
abstract: Suicide bomber kills at least three people near market in Nigerian state of Borno; attack bears hallmarks of Islamist militant group Boko Haram, though no one has yet claimed responsibility.
lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber killed at least three people Saturday in an attack on a market in northeast Nigeria, police and civilian vigilante sources said.
